    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Exam(int weight, int duration)
      This constructs an exam with its respective weight b/w 1-100 and duration b/w 30-180 inclusive.

      • Exam

        public Exam(int weight,
            int duration)
     throws InvalidDurationException
        This constructs an exam with its respective weight b/w 1-100 and duration b/w 30-180 inclusive.
        Parameters:
        weight - - weightage of the exam
        duration - Time duration of the exam in minutes
        Throws:
        InvalidDurationException - Duration out of bounds either < 30 or > 180
